data.text: Datɨrɨghɨn, ia Israelia, uan adarazigh nɨghnɨgh, ziar kamning me darɨgh, “Ia Godɨn Gumazamizibara,” ko “God Bar Ia Gifonge.”
Ezɨ God akar isɨn zuim uan gumazamizibagh amua ghaze:
An arazir kam ateghan koghtɨ, kɨ an korotiaba sueghtɨ, a bibiamra ikɨ bar aghumsigham.
An boriba, me tuavimɨn amizim otezir boribar mɨn iti.
Men amebar kam uan pam ategha, tintinibar gumazir igharaziba ko akua navim asegha aghumsɨziba puvatɨ, egha kamaghɨn mɨgei,
“Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ temer dɨkoniba itiba inigh an tuavim apɨrigham.
A ifongezir gumazibar gɨn ivegh mangɨ, egh me batoghan kogham.
“A kamaghɨn foghan aghua, kɨ uabɨ dagheba ko, wainɨn dɨpam ko, olivɨn borem ko, silva ko, gol ko, bizir maba sara bar a ganɨngi.
Kamaghɨn amizɨ, dagheba asiamin dughiam otoghtɨ, kɨ dagheba ko wainɨn a ganɨngiziba,
Egh a ifongezir gumazibar damazimɨn,
Dughiar ekiar a bar akongeziba, kɨ bar da agɨvagham.
Kɨ an wainɨn ikarɨziba ko fighɨn temeba kɨ bar dagh asɨghasɨgham.
A dughiar ruarimɨn na gɨnamada,
Egha Ikiavɨra Itir God uam akar isɨn zuimɨn kamaghɨn mɨgei:
Egh kɨ wainɨn azeniba isɨ ua a danɨngam.
Egha Ikiavɨra Itir God kamaghɨn Israelia mɨgei:
Kɨ ia ateghtɨ,
“Dughiar kamɨn, kɨ asɨzir atiaba ko, kuruziba ko, kuaraziba koma akar dɨkɨrɨzir gavgavim damigham.
“Israel, kɨ nɨ damightɨ nɨ nan amuimɨn mɨn otogham,
Kɨ uan akar dɨkɨrɨzimɨn gɨntɨgham,
Kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God,
Egh kɨ uan gumazamiziba nguazir kamɨn me arightɨ,
